channel.title: How to turn router off + How to change NPC location cordinates
channel.description:
Ok, so my two noob questions are:
1. How do I turn my router off? Do I turn it off through the lil website thing or is there a switch on it that I have to use?
2. How do I change an NPC's cordinates. I know how to change objects. But I can't figure out how to change it with NPC's.
If anyone could help, it would be greatly appriciated. If you need more info on my problems just ask.
Thanks.

item.title: How to turn router off + How to change NPC location cordinates
item.dc:creator: @_Sunkist _Sunkist_
item.description:
@_Sunkist wrote:

Autospawn comes with the source lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to turn router off + How to change NPC location cordinates
item.dc:creator: @TH3_1_N_ON1Y TH3 1 N ON1Y
item.description:
@TH3_1_N_ON1Y wrote:

  1. Turn your router off by unplugging the power cord in the back of the router.

  2. Changing NPC coords is in autospawn.cfg

Read full topic
